    49	    def forward(self, sentence_features: Iterable[dict[str, torch.Tensor]], labels: torch.Tensor):
    50	        """Forward propagation that follows [`sentence_transformers.losses`](https://github.com/UKPLab/sentence-transformers/tree/master/sentence_transformers/losses)."""
    51	        reps = [self.model(sentence_feature)["sentence_embedding"] for sentence_feature in sentence_features]
    52	        assert len(reps) == 3
    53	        rep_anchor, rep_positive, rep_negative = reps
    54	
    55	        combined_loss, cluster_loss, centri_loss = None, None, None
    56	        
    57	        ### TODO: compute and combine hyperbolic clustering and centripetal losses here
    58	
    59	        return {
    60	            "loss": combined_loss,
    61	            "cluster_loss": cluster_loss,
    62	            "centri_loss": centri_loss,
    63	        }
    64
